cause.title: The extender tabs are not locked in place.
cause.p: All four extender tabs that adjust the stand length must be locked securely in place to avoid instability.

remedy.title: Make sure all four extender tabs are locked in place.

cmd.xref: How to secure the floor stand extender tabs.

cause.title: The floor stand is not locked in place.
cause.p: The screw that adjusts the legs of the floor stand must be tight to avoid instability.

remedy.title: Secure the screw at the base of the stand.

step.cmd: Make sure the screw at the bottom of the floor stand that secures the base is tight. How to adjust and secure the base of the floor stand.
